[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: StaticPropertyFetch {
                target: Identifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier(
                        SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span {
                                line: 1,
                                column: 7,
                                position: 6,
                            },
                            value: "Foo",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                double_colon: Span {
                    line: 1,
                    column: 10,
                    position: 9,
                },
                property: VariableVariable(
                    VariableVariable {
                        span: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 12,
                            position: 11,
                        },
                        variable: SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 1,
                                    column: 13,
                                    position: 12,
                                },
                                name: "$a",
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            },
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 1,
                    column: 15,
                    position: 14,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
